summary: Thomas has decided to die, and spends his last day driving around to say good-bye to everybody, his son, wife, mistress and all others. Nobody understands that this good-bye is definite, and still he says things they will never forget.
cast: Mikael Persbrandt|Sam Kessel|Maria Bonnevie|Michael Nyqvist|Lena Endre|Hans Alfredson|Pernilla August|Fares Fares|Marie Göranzon|Tuva Novotny|Erland Josephson|Sanna Vic
title: Dag och natt
